revised_title: Adjustment of Compasses in Iron Vessels: Correspondence between the Board of Trade and the Royal Society
tldr: The Board of Trade and the Royal Society discuss the challenges of adjusting compasses in iron vessels and explore possible solutions to improve navigation safety. They consider the role of shipowners, insurers, and government intervention in regulating compasses and suggest the development of a manual for proper supply, placement, and adjustment of compasses. They also propose introducing the subject into nautical education and examinations.
